about_the_game:
Prepare for a chaotic physics sandbox where dominoes go wild and overkill!

Explosions, chain reactions, and utter madness is what you can expect. Dumbino takes the simple concept of dominoes and cranks it up to an unhinged level of goofiness!

Rack your brains with crazy constructions and creative or chaotic solutions for mass domino destruction! Express your creativity or madness in the level editor. Assemble, destroy, tip and share your creations with the community!

Special Goofy Dominoes

Unlock crazy Dumbinoes each their own powers to blast the dominoes and go head first into a world of absolute chaos! Physics goes off the rails and the dominoes aren't just falling—they're exploding, catapulting, and triggering the wildest chain reactions. Get ready to blow your mind with overly complicated constructions, and brace yourself for the total mayhem that follows!

Single Player Campaign

In Dumbino, create your solution with a flexible and packed building system with many tools and dominoes! The game’s physics system delivers a deeply satisfying building and simulation experience, whether you're wreaking havoc as the master of destruction or watching your plans hilariously crumble until you finally find your way.

Build, Break, and Share!

Let your wildest ideas run wild in the level editor. Build the most outrageous domino constructions or grandiose structures that defy logic. Then, share your chaotic creations with the community and let them appreciate your most unique masterpieces or mesmerizing falldowns!

  • Domino destruction with hours of chaotic, goofy, and hilarious gameplay in a campaign filled with madness

  • 5 insane worlds with their own mechanics that are crazier than the last

  • Over-the-top physics fueled with dozens of objects for even more unhinged domino toppling

  • A multitude of challenges for the most die-hard and chaotic players

  • Community content with unlimited potential with the level editor!

    Ready for Chaos?If you're looking for a domino game that's off-the-wall, chaotic, and completely overkill, Dumbino is your game. Blow things up, and let the madness begin!

name: Dumbino

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080

short_description: Dumbino is a funny chaotic physics-based puzzle game where you topple dominoes with explosions, wild chain reactions, and pure madness. Embrace the epic goofy mayhem as you create and solve unhinged levels. Build and share your craziest designs and custom levels with the community!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Finnish*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
